p: The antiviral and immunomodulatory activities of medicinal plants have been reported (Erukainure, Mesaik, et al., 2017; Vijayan et al., 2004). This has been attributed to their ability to modulate inflammatory cytokines and phagocytic activities of monocytes, neutrophils and macrophages (Erukainure, Mesaik, et al., 2017; Harun et al., 2015), with their phytochemical constituents playing an influential role. Clerodendrum volubile is among medicinal plants reported for their immunomodulatory activities (Erukainure, Hafizur, et al., 2017; Erukainure, Zaruwa, et al., 2017; Erukainure et al., 2016).
